eu.sathra.ai
Class SelectorTask

java.lang.Object
  eu.sathra.ai.Task
      eu.sathra.ai.SelectorTask

public class SelectorTask
extends Task

This task will iterate through each of it's children until one of them returns TRUE or all of children will return FALSE. If one of the children returns TRUE or RUNNING, Selector will also return this value. If all of children return FALSE, selector also returns false.

Author:
Milosz Moczkowski
